verses.name: Job 7:1
verses.text: Is there not an appointed time to man upon earth? are not his days also like the days of an hireling?

verses.name: Job 7:2
verses.text: As a servant earnestly desireth the shadow, and as an hireling looketh for the reward of his work:

verses.name: Job 7:3
verses.text: So am I made to possess months of vanity, and wearisome nights are appointed to me.

verses.name: Job 7:4
verses.text: When I lie down, I say, When shall I arise, and the night be gone? and I am full of tossings to and fro unto the dawning of the day.
